text: Alain Vigneron (born 1 September 1954) is a former French racing cyclist. He rode in ten Grand Tours between 1980 and 1986. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:People from Bas-Rhin Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Alain Vigneron
